message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1200000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. It's still a great deal considering the product's value and uniqueness. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for it.
I understand Alice, thank you for your patience. Considering the product's unique nature, I would like to propose an offer of $1350000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $1700000. It's a fair compromise considering the product's value and your offer. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose an offer of $1600000 for the product.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1650000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering you a price of $1650000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but unfortunately, I cannot agree to $1650000. I would like to propose an offer of $1600000.
